content:
"AMPure XP Beads" or "AXP": suspension
"Blunt/TA Ligase Master Mix": solution
"Bovine Serum Albumin" or "BSA": 50mg/ml, solution
"DNA Control Sample" or "DCS" or "diluted DCS": solution, notes: Diluted and ready to use
"purified DNA samples": solution
"Ethanol" or "EtOH": 100%, liquid
"EDTA" or "EDTA (blue cap)": solution, notes: have blue cap EDTA only
"Elution Buffer" or "EB": solution
"Flow Cell Flush" or "FCF": solution
"Flow Cell Tether" or "FCT": solution
"80% ethanol in nuclease-free water" or "80% ethanol": 80%, solution
"gDNA" or "genomic DNA": solution
"Library Solution" or "LIS": solution
"MinION and GridION Flow Cell" or "Flow Cell": device, doc: MinION-manual
"Native Adapter" or "NA": solution
"Native Barcode" or "NB01": solution, notes: have NB01 only
"NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Buffer": solution
"NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Mix": solution
"NEBNext Quick Ligation Reaction Buffer": 5X, stock solution
"nuclease-free water" or "H2O" or "water": liquid
"Quick T4 DNA Ligase" or "T4 DNA Ligase": solution
"Sequencing Buffer" or "SB": solution
"Short Fragment Buffer" or "SFB": solution
"Ultra II End-prep Enzyme Mix": solution
"Ultra II End-prep Reaction Buffer": solution
<manuals> MinION-manual
The information about all reagents has been saved to the file: Reagent-68a6
